3: You've arrived at the right moment. The surrounding Corrupted are taking up part of the Purifying Force's attention.
His signal has stopped right ahead. Inside that enclosed energy chamber.
That should be what he was looking for.
If that is the same energy that caused Karen's abnormality, then Kamui's stability also comes into question.
It's not me breaking your promise, but orders are orders.
We've made our call. Kamui is a threat that requires purifying.
How'd you guarantee that it ain't a monster coming out of that tin can?
Bianca, you're the leader of the Purifying Force.
Then don't come crying to me when you get a mention in my report.
You have your standards, I have mine.
Oh, what a load of bull you spill.
